## Reusable Components

> [!TIP]
> **Using a pre-registered component?** Select from the list below to auto-populate fields.
>
> NOTE: You must right-click and select `Open in New Window` or press `Ctrl+R` after selection for the pre-filled links to work.

<details>
<summary>Pre-registered Model Components (must be opened in a new window)</summary>

{prefill_links}

</details>

## Stage 3: Model Component

This form has two sections:
1. **Component Definition** — Registers the model component itself (name, type, description)
2. **Grid Configuration** — Links the component to computational grids for use in a source_id registration

[![Workflow](https://mermaid.ink/svg/pako:eNq9Vgtv2jAQ_iuWUacNJTySAG2kbep4tRJoVWGbtjEhkxhi1bGjxGlLH_995wRYWlrWVt0sJbF9r893vtxdY0_6FLt4zuWFF5BYocHpRKBs7O2ho-P-0QCeMTpEo_Fhv-uidkDEgiIVUJSoJaeIqGwxk0rJECmJArYIODyqoOhzpJgUiYtGiixo3ci_loGGvdXcXn0dLbWWTNLZIiZRsBL7OcHlcjZF9XJ5gn-t-fQYaXI_Zj5qU84T9AaNtDTzC3xU-I-rtwrqrS31Pouppw-Bxp_umLUIyB3JmF1JoQhH_bsmc54Z8HylsWLeNsdjoIa9DNAQIsRRj4SML5-MqjsagnAXAgqHWyaKhisN9-Tb2kZbhpEUVKhtnp0OswsOs7fjock5-I2Bp2p2Cpqdbc3OWvPj-kZ1ZJofbhalUslACbxvdKQ2VItkZC8n2H_2Z9n--f19O2eXYs4W6LgDNGdNA1cjswLUeeY8k_lFaru3TbSLQD3OvDMNd4IDpaLErVYXTAXprOLJsPqtfXpitofHJ9VukoADGeFmdnKzI700hB2io19lSZLSpCroxUeIdcSJou_13Z96kAtTIvxpkidDZRmC19B0xok4u4cBnPLqIIJNYkxBVZTmrLD6K5jZ64M5X2XgM6HYr48k1HwZjCwvdll3_pH1HTb1lf5HR87zYIdtSJj_a7pQpTrd3uGXwRhK3fdBd7T5NWVlLq9AsIjlGXVLtm0b-dy8YL4KXCu6NOaMc1dARB8QtV4kOuy93KL9clHnGaIPtgsm6vpMNwYsQZwJqvsCL-8cNu0Begtx1YFDMlVoLmMkCs3Du50nqtWaTc-7i8wuIsMGDmkcEuZDd3Od4cTQpoR0gl2Y-nROUg71aCJugZWkSo6WwsOuilNq4FimiwC7c8ITWKWRD7eowwhUqHDNon8aG3YoPjRuy1Qo7LYMHBHxQ8oNKyyxe40vsWs1K7bVatRaLatlNa16yzbwErZr-5WWcwCjZjecZuOgcWvgq0xDrbLfahiYgjdlPMybtaxnu_0N9sUcFQ)](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file#submitting-emd)

> [!NOTE]
> Please ensure you are familiar with the completion guidance in the collapsible dropdown where it exists. Failure to do so will result in a failed submission.

---

### Component Definition

This section defines the model component that can be reused across multiple source_id registrations.

label: Component Type
description: The scientific domain that this component simulates.

label: Component Name
description: The official component name including version information.

label: Component Family
description: The component family that this component belongs to.

label: Description
description: A scientific overview of the component including main processes and key physics.
placeholder:
1. Main processes simulated
2. Key physics/parameterizations
3. Notable features of this version

label: Code Repository
description: The URL to the source code repository or 'private' if not publicly available.

label: Reference DOIs
description: The DOI URLs for publications describing this component.

---

### Grid Configuration

This section links the component to computational grids, generating a composite configuration ID (e.g., `ocean_nemo-v3-6_c101_v103`) for use in Stage 4: Model (source_id) registration.

**Prerequisites:** Horizontal grid ID (c###) from Stage 2a and/or Vertical grid ID (v###) from Stage 2b.

label: Horizontal Grid
description: The horizontal computational grid that this component uses.

label: Vertical Grid
description: The vertical computational grid that this component uses.

---

## Issue Handling

**After submission:**
- Creates `model_component` and `component_config` entries
- Config ID format: `<domain>_<component>_<c###>_<v###>`
- Use the config ID in Stage 4 (Model)
- Track progress in issue comments

label: Issue Kind
description: Whether this is a new submission or a modification to an existing entry.
